itunes:title: Savage Saturday's With Derek Weida! - 14
title: Savage Saturday's With Derek Weida! - 14
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Derek Weida welcomes special guest professional powerlifter Brandon Allen to discuss how he got his start in powerlifting, Derek finds out the mindset of a competitive powerlifter at his peak and the amount of work it takes to perform on Brandon’s level,...
itunes:summary:
Derek Weida welcomes special guest professional powerlifter Brandon Allen to discuss how he got his start in powerlifting, Derek finds out the mindset of a competitive powerlifter at his peak and the amount of work it takes to perform on Brandon’s level, and Brandon goes on to talk about the times he experienced the the most excruciating pain during competitions and what he did to overcome those moments.

description:
Derek Weida welcomes special guest professional powerlifter Brandon Allen to discuss how he got his start in powerlifting, Derek finds out the mindset of a competitive powerlifter at his peak and the amount of work it takes to perform on Brandon’s level, and Brandon goes on to talk about the times he experienced the the most excruciating pain during competitions and what he did to overcome those moments.

Derek Weida welcomes special guest professional powerlifter Brandon Allen to discuss how he got his start in powerlifting, Derek finds out the mindset of a competitive powerlifter at his peak and the amount of work it takes to perform on Brandon’s level, and Brandon goes on to talk about the times he experienced the the most excruciating pain during competitions and what he did to overcome those moments.
